author: Special Correspondent
text:
D. Navaneethakrishnan, 55, of Andarkottaram was hacked to death at Thenpalanji near Austinpatti on Monday morning.

He was the priest of the Balagurunathan Angaleeswari Temple. He had been there in the early hours of Monday to perform puja on the occasion of Sivarathiri. Sathish, who had been the priest earlier in the temple and removed by the people, developed enmity against Navaneethakrishnan. Sathish along with another person have hacked him around 6 a.m.
title: Man hacked to death
